comments.author: angela
comments.body:
as far as I know all TODOs and default-throw implementations have been replaced now in

- jcr2spi
- spi2jcr
- spi2dav
- spi2davex
- jcr-server.

leaving issue open until TCK is completed and we see that things work as expected.

component: jackrabbit-jcr-server, jackrabbit-jcr2spi, jackrabbit-spi, jackrabbit-spi-commons, jackrabbit-spi2dav, jackrabbit-spi2jcr, JCR 2.0
